description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
	Features
DIAGRAM-33207 - Export Diagram to XAML.
DIAGRAM-33201 - Support Shape.GluedShapes(Flags, CategoryFilter, pOtherConnectedShape)

Enhancements
DIAGRAM-33229 - [Linux + Mono] cannot render diagrams on Linux + Mono
DIAGRAM-33198 - [PDF Rendering] Support pre-defined page sizes when rendering to PDF
DIAGRAM-33174 - [Diagram.AddShape] Extend AddShape method to support group shapes
DIAGRAM-31758 - Create method Shear in class DrMatrix from Aspose.Foundation.

Task
DIAGRAM-33240 - Update product EULA
DIAGRAM-33236 - Add boundary NUnit tests for Aspose.Diagram.Manipulation namespace.
DIAGRAM-33232 - Install environment Linux and Mono for bug fixing and testing.

Bugs
DIAGRAM-33246 - Exception while read VSD file.
DIAGRAM-33234 - While setting empty string, an Array out of bounds exception occurs.
DIAGRAM-33233 - Wrong text alignment within the red circles
DIAGRAM-33211 - The number of Connects on the Page is different, when diagram is loaded from .vsd and .vdx fails.
DIAGRAM-33205 - Export from VSD to HTML exception.
DIAGRAM-33161 - [XPS] Output of new diagram was incorrect when converted to XPS
DIAGRAM-33160 - [PDF] Output of new diagram was incorrect when converted to PDF
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
